forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm during the evening, then some lingering showers still possible overnight. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with a possible thunderstorm in the evening, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 2C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 36F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
